Articles.Content:
Okay, So I have recently updated to KSP 0.21 and i usually use a lot of mods, I had a modded file, Which got broken, Also i've tought of posting somekinda update on here/youtube, But i need your help, I can't find mods that are good quality and work with KSP 0.21, Go ahead, Post a link, Thank you. I will put ten mods, Not more not less, I will state your name for suggesting the mod, I will not accept all of them, They must fit in these rules, 1. Not Outrageously OP. 2. High Quality. 3. Things such as Modular multiwheels and B9, Novapack, That kinda packs, With lot of stuff, Also i'll add kethane in without a suggestion, I will post my crafts here, And put a download, If enough of people want.4. Good textures, No blur, No one coloured. 5.Even tough it doesn't fit in these mods, Just send the link, i will check it out and findout if its good, And i might add it, Main objects will be Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Getting to mun Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Getting to Minmus Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Have a Every planet covering satellite system Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Reach north pole and Make a boat(Please give me a boat mod)Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Have a rescue fleet of boats, Helicopters, Planes, Rockets,PodsÃ¢â‚¬Â¢ Visit every planetÃ¢â‚¬Â¢ Get all my stuff from space to kerbinÃ¢â‚¬Â¢ Make atleast 25 crazy desingsÃ¢â‚¬Â¢Making a Giant spacestation to kerbin orbit

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Explore whole "universe".

Since kethane rig on jool = impossible

First off, "Having a kethane rig on Jool" Cannot be done. Second if you had a mic I would check ya out. I think everyone is capable of making a good youtube series of KSP it just takes the right materials and time to do so. Check out my series if you want, up to episode 12 link in my signature.

Oh, It must be a typo, Jool, What were i thinking I'

Mic i'll get maybe today, Theres just this proplem called im not from english country, I'll give it a try, Im propably younger than most of youtubers, 13, Hmph, I'll try still

Edited August 12, 2013 by Wirynino
TO not post twice

Don't let age get you down, I'm only 3 years older then you, and also, as long as your not real childish and bouncing off the walls I would give you a shot.

What's your native language? Even if you have a heavy accent it still might to be good to watch some accents add to the style of the video. Look at Scott Manley.
Finnish, Im actually not bouncing on the walls, Thats strange,
Okay, We just need the mods, Please anyone?
Kethane, Mechjeb, Tac life support, Remotech, Nova punch, B9 ( if you plan on building space planes )
